Main_items.Title/Summary: clearly and briefly describes the essence of this bug
Main_items.Steps_to_Replay: a clear, consistent description of the steps / actions to be taken to reproduce the bug with all the necessary information
Main_items.Expected_result: the result we wanted/expected to see
Main_items.Bug_Severity: shows how serious are the consequences of the bug in terms of the impact on the system (S4|Blocker, S3|Critical, S2|Major, S1|Minor

Optional items.Screenshot/video: image/video that clearly and visually demonstrates the bug
Optional items.Requirement: reference to a requirement that has not been complied with
Optional items.Bug type: to analyze weaknesses in software, bugs can be classified into types
Optional items.Priority: the turn in which the bug will be fixed (High -> Medium -> Low)
Optional items.Additional files: files that are needed to reproduce the bug (files of a certain size, type, logs, etc.)
Optional items.Environment: information about the environment in which the bug is reproduced (browser version, OS, screen size, test server, etc.)
Optional items.Status: current status of the bug in its lifecycle (Open, In Progress...)
Optional items.Author: the person who caused the bug (needed to clarify the information, if necessary)
Optional items.Performer: the person who is working on the bug at the moment
Optional items.Version: the software version in which the bug was found
Optional items.Version of fix: the software version in which the bug fix will be added
